casebody.data:
In the matter of T.F.L., S.D.L., and B.A.N.L. No. 366P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Mark L. Flayes, Attorney at Law, for Lovely, Kimberly Dawn. Paul W. Freeman, Wilkesboro, Attorney at Law, for Wilkes County DSS. Neil A. Riemann, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for GAL.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th of November 2015 by Respondent (Mother) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
